TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XsdDataContractExporter extends System.Object

summary.span: 允許將資料合約中使用的 .NET Framework 類型集合轉換成 XML 結構描述檔案 (.xsd)。

span.span: Allows the transformation of a set of .NET Framework types that are used in data contracts into an XML schema file (.xsd).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您已建立合併 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 型別表示之資料的 Web 服務，以及當您需要匯出其他 Web 服務要取用之每個型別的 XML 結構描述時，即可使用 類別。Use the class when you have created a Web service that incorporates data represented by common language runtime (CLR) types and when you need to export XML schemas for each type to be consumed by other Web services. 也就是 會將 CLR 型別集合轉換成 XML 結構描述 That is, transforms a set of CLR types into XML schemas. (如需可用類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md)。)這樣一來，這些結構描述就可以透過 Web 服務描述語言 (Web Services Description Language，WSDL) 文件公開，提供需要與您的服務相互操作之其他使用者加以使用。(For more information about the types that can be used, see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md).) The schemas can then be exposed through a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document for use by others who need to interoperate with your service. 相反地，如果您要建立必須與現有 Web 服務相互操作的 Web 服務，則可使用 來轉換 XML 結構描述，並且建立可表示選定程式設計語言內資料的 CLR 型別。Conversely, if you are creating a Web service that must interoperate with an existing Web service, use the to transform XML schemas and create the CLR types that represent the data in a selected programming language. 會產生其中包含結構描述集合的 物件。The generates an object that contains the collection of schemas. 透過 屬性，存取結構描述的集合。Access the set of schemas through the property. > [!NOTE] > 為了快速產生其他 Web 服務可以取用的 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 檔案，此時要使用 。To quickly generate XML schema definition (XSD) files that other Web services can consume, use the . ## 將結構描述匯出至 XmlSchemaSetExporting Schemas Into an XmlSchemaSet 若要建立其中包含 XML 結構描述檔案之 類別的執行個體，您應該留意下列事項。To create an instance of the class that contains XML schema files, you should be aware of the following. 匯出的型別集合會記錄成為內部的資料合約集合。The set of types you are exporting are recorded as an internal set of data contracts. 因此您可以多次呼叫 方法，在不會降低效能的情況下將新型別加入結構描述集合中，因為只有新型別會新增至該集合。Thus, you can call the method multiple times to add new types to the schema set without degrading performance because only the new types will be added to the set. 在 作業期間，現有的結構描述會跟新加入的結構描述進行比較。During the operation, the existing schemas are compared to the new schemas being added. 如果這時發生衝突，就會擲回例外狀況。If there are conflicts, an exception will be thrown. 通常在兩種型別使用相同的資料合約名稱，但是同一個 執行個體卻匯出不同的合約 (即不同的成員) 時，就會偵測到衝突。A conflict is usually detected if two types with the same data contract name but different contracts (different members) are exported by the same instance. ## 使用匯出工具Using the Exporter 這個類別的建議使用方式如下：A recommended way of using this class is as follows: 1. 使用其中一種 多載，即可判定是否可以匯出指定的型別或型別集合。Use one of the overloads to determine whether the specified type or set of types can be exported. 使用符合您個人需求的一種多載。Use one of the overloads that is appropriate to your requirements. 2. 呼叫對應的 方法。Call the corresponding method. 3. 從 屬性擷取結構描述。Retrieve the schemas from the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立 的執行個體，然後呼叫 方法。The following example creates an instance of the and calls the method. [!code-csharp[XsdDataContractExporter#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xsddatacontractexporter/cs/overview.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XsdDataContractExporter#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xsddatacontractexporter/vb/overview.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要將新結構描述新增至現有的 時，即可使用這個多載。Use this overload when you have an existing to which you want to add new schemas. 在使用這個多載建構 之後，請呼叫 方法，將新型別新增至現有的集合。After you construct a with this overload, call the method to add new types to the existing set.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否能夠匯出 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型 (或類型集合)。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a common language runtime (CLR) type (or set of types) can be exported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並不是所有的 CLR 型別都能夠用在資料合約中。Not all CLR types can be used in data contracts. 如需可序列化的詳細資訊，請參閱[Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md)。For more information about what can be serialized, see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md).

summary.span: 將 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型或類型集合轉換成 XML 結構描述集合。

span.span: Transforms the common language runtime (CLR) type, or set of types, into a set of XML schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建議做法是使用其中一個 多載來判定是否能夠匯出指定的型別或型別集合。As a recommended practice, use one of the overloads to determine whether the specified type or set of types can be exported. 在呼叫 方法後，從 屬性擷取結構描述。After calling the method, retrieve the schemas from the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的主要用途是允許在 XML 結構描述中提供匿名類型。The main purpose of this method is to allow anonymous types in XML schema to be represented. 因為匿名型別沒有合約名稱和命名空間，所以不能使用 進行查閱。Because anonymous types do not have a contract name and namespace, they cannot be looked up using the . 這個方法會傳回這種型別的 定義。This method returns the definition for such types. 對於 方法傳回有效名稱的類型，這個方法會傳回 `null`。The types for which the method returns a valid name, this method returns `null`.

span.span: The argument is .
